message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair considering the impact of inflation on our potential gains in later rounds.

Considering the impact of inflation on both our potential gains, I believe this offer strikes a balance between our interests. It's slightly more favorable to me, reflecting the higher depreciation of the money's value to you if we proceed further.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but your offer doesn't account for the faster rate at which the value decreases for me.  This offer is more in line with the risks we both face as time goes on.
